page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER - COBHAM SY
page.content: {COBHAM POLICE SERVICE} The station has 2 cells and 12 offices. There are 21 policemen and 1 policewoman. 1 is a dog handler, 1 is a sergeant, 4 are village policemen and others work in the office or drive cars. PC Evans is our village policeman. He carries a torch, handcuffs and a walkie-talkie, but no gun. {COBHAM FIRE SERVICE} The fire station has 28 firemen and one officer, with 5 firemen on duty at a time. It is called Pains Hill station to save confusion with Chobham. At present they have only 1 fire engine, another is due soon. There were 49 calls in May. There were 6 fires. 1 house fire, 3 grass fires and 2 chimney fires. The busiest place is the Motorway and roads.
